anime.description: An educational film about trying to see others by `walking a mile in their shoes`. This one focuses on a listless teenager who is having trouble with his university entrance examinations and his father harping on him; and a pregnant woman who wants to work after the birth but her husband thinks it`s wrong because a woman`s place is at home. Source: MAL

tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: CAST MISSING
tag.description: Important characters are missing, either in-part or entirely. This includes basic entry info (name, gender, picture), appear episode range, seiyuu and/or tags.
